Class Missile

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor

  • public class Missile
extends Weapons
    Missiles are aerial weapons that affect and damage all unsubmerged Battleships.

        public Missile​(int damage,
               BattleWorld bw)
        Create a Missile with specified damage and BattleWorld.
        Parameters:
        damage - The damage this missile should deal to a Battleship it hits.
        bw - The BattleWorld this missile is in.
